Uses of Package
de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment

  • Packages that use de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment 
    Package Description
    de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment  
  • Classes in de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment used by de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment 
    Class and Description
    AbstractSession
    Project: LUIS ePayment PaySession is the first class to use in LUIS ePayment.
    CardReader
    Project: LUIS ePayment An instance of this class allows the direct access to a card reader.
    Configuration
    Project: LUIS ePayment This interface represents the configuration of the electronic payment device.
    PayConfiguration
    Project: LUIS ePayment This class represents the configuration of the electronic payment device.
    PayFirmwareSettings
    Project: LUIS ePayment This class holds some information about the used firmware within the payment terminal.
    PayMedia
    Project: LUIS ePayment During a payment/refund transaction, this class is filled with the information about the payment media used.
    PayMessageListener
    Project: LUIS ePayment Every command sent to the payment terminal, returns some status information, what has happened.
    PayResult
    * Project: LUIS ePayment Most methods of LUIS ePayment return some value to the caller.
    PayResultSales
    Project: LUIS ePayment This class contains the result of a reconciliation or a turnoverTotals call.
    PayTerminal
    Project: LUIS ePayment This is the central class to use the payment facilities of LUIS ePayment.
    PayTransaction
    Project: LUIS ePayment The payment transaction is a two step thing.
    PINConstraints
    Project: LUIS ePayment When a customer inserts a user defined PIN on the keyboard of the PINPad, this PIN may be checked against some constraints like length or a given blacklist.
    PINPad
    Project: LUIS ePayment An instance of this class allows the direct access to a pinpad and its display.
    ProductCategory 
    ReceiptType
    Enumeration type for specifying the type of a receipt.
